00016 const std::string actionsnames[MAX_COMMANDS] =
00017 {
00018   "Left:        ",
00019   "Right:       ",
00020   "Up:          ",
00021   "Down:        ",
00022   "Upper left:  ",
00023   "Upper right: ",
00024   "Lower left:  ",
00025   "Lower right: ",
00026   "Jump:        ",
00027   "Pogo:        ",
00028   "Fire:        ",
00029   "Status:      ",
00030   "Help:        ",
00031   "Quit:        "
00032 };

00034 #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) { delete x; x = NULL; }
00035 
00036 CControlsettings::CControlsettings( Uint8 dlg_theme ) :
00037 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme),
00038 m_chosenPlayer(0),
00039 m_waiting_for_input(false)
00040 {
00041  m_suspended = true;
00042 
00043  std::list<std::string> players_list;
00044  for(size_t i=1 ; i<=MAX_PLAYERS ; i++)
00045   players_list.push_back(itoa(i) + " Player");
00046 
00047  // first create the players selection screen
00048  mp_SubMenu = new CSelectionMenu<Uint8>( m_chosenPlayer, players_list, dlg_theme );
00049 
00050  // Then create the controls selection screen
00051  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(36, 18, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN, m_dlg_theme);
00052 
00053  for(unsigned int i=0 ; i<MAX_COMMANDS ; i++)
00054   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, i+1, actionsnames[i]);
00055 
00056  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, MAX_COMMANDS+1, "");
00057  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 2, MAX_COMMANDS+2, "Reset Controls");
00058 }
00059 
00060 void CControlsettings::setControlsText()
00061 {
00062  // Here it sets up the items after the player number was chosen
00063  // Then create the controls selection screen
00064  std::string buf, buf2;
00065 
00066  for(unsigned int i=0 ; i<MAX_COMMANDS ; i++)
00067  {
00068   buf2 = g_pInput->getEventName(IC_LEFT+i, m_chosenPlayer-1);
00069   buf = actionsnames[i] + buf2;
00070   mp_Dialog->setObjectText(i, buf);
00071  }
00072  
00073  buf = "Two Button Firing ";
00074  buf += g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1) ? 28 : 20;
00075  buf += g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1) ? 29 : 21;
00076  buf += g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1) ? 30 : 22;
00077  buf += g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1) ? 31 : 23;
00078  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(MAX_COMMANDS)->m_Option->m_FontMapID = 1;
00079  mp_Dialog->setObjectText(MAX_COMMANDS, buf);
00080 }
00081 
00082 void CControlsettings::processSpecific()
00083 { 
00084  if(!m_suspended)
00085  {
00086   if(m_waiting_for_input) // This part only happens, when waiting for an input
00087    processWaitInput();
00088   else
00089    processSelection();
00090  }
00091  else
00092  {
00093   mp_SubMenu->processCommon();
00094   mp_SubMenu->processSpecific();
00095   mp_SubMenu->postProcess();
00096 
00097   if(mp_SubMenu->mustClose())
00098   {
00099    SAFE_DELETE(mp_SubMenu);
00100    m_suspended = false;
00101    if(m_chosenPlayer == 0)
00102    {
00103     m_mustclose = true;
00104     m_suspended = true;
00105    }
00106    else
00107     setControlsText();
00108   }
00109  }
00110 }
00111 
00112 void CControlsettings::processWaitInput()
00113 {
00114  int item = m_selection;
00115  while( !g_pInput->readNewEvent(m_chosenPlayer-1,item) );
00116 
00117  std::string buf;
00118  std::string buf2;
00119 
00120  buf = mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject[m_selection]->m_Option->m_text;
00121  buf = buf.erase(actionsnames[item].size());
00122  buf2 = g_pInput->getEventName(item, m_chosenPlayer-1);
00123  mp_Dialog->setObjectText(m_selection, buf + buf2);
00124  mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN);
00125  m_selection = -1;
00126  m_waiting_for_input = false;
00127 }
00128 
00129 void CControlsettings::processSelection()
00130 {
00131  if( m_mustclose ) // if the menu must close, save the settings
00132  {
00133   g_pInput->saveControlconfig();
00134   m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00135  }
00136  
00137  if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION) // Normal selection function
00138  {
00139   if( m_selection < MAX_COMMANDS+2 )
00140   {
00141    if(m_selection < MAX_COMMANDS)
00142    {
00143     std::string buf, buf2;
00144     m_waiting_for_input = true;
00145     g_pInput->flushAll();
00146 
00147     buf = mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject[m_selection]->m_Option->m_text;
00148     buf = buf.erase(actionsnames[m_selection].size());
00149 
00150     buf2 = "*Waiting for Input*";
00151     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(m_selection, buf + buf2);
00152     mp_Dialog->setInputMode(INPUT_MODE_NOTHING);
00153    }
00154    else if(m_selection == MAX_COMMANDS)
00155    {
00156     std::string buf;
00157     bool twb = g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1);
00158     twb = !twb;
00159     g_pInput->setTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1, twb);
00160     buf = "Two Button Firing ";
00161     buf += g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1) ? 28 : 20;
00162     buf += g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1) ? 29 : 21;
00163     buf += g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1) ? 30 : 22;
00164     buf += g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_chosenPlayer-1) ? 31 : 23;
00165     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(m_selection, buf);
00166     m_selection = -1;
00167    }
00168    else if(m_selection == MAX_COMMANDS+1)
00169    {
00170     g_pInput->resetControls(m_chosenPlayer);
00171     setControlsText();
00172     m_selection = -1;
00173    }
00174   }
00175  }
00176 }
